website_summaries.verdict: 3M is a brand name recognized for its quality products, and this is no exception.
pros: This works on brake parts to clean off all kinds of grease and contaminants
It can also be used to clean other metal products that are gunked up
It sprays on easily and evaporates quickly
cons: You must wear latex or plastic gloves when using this product to avoid skin damage

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Degreases, and rinses well. Easy to control spray power. This works well on all types of grease, oils, and fine dust, etc. The odor is not so powerful as the acetone version (3M 08180). Does not cloud acrylic. Does not dissolve paint (YMMV). Evaporates quickly, so there is less runoff and mess to clean up. I used this to clean dry (wax) lube from a bicycle drive-train. I can easily go through a whole can for one cleaning. Serious gunk should be cleaned off with a penetrating oil and/or degreaser. I recommend saving this brake cleaner for the final rinse. (UPDATED: I had swapped part numbers accidentally.)
customer_reviews.author: Josh (Xaminmo) Davis

customer_reviews.title: I really like this brake cleaner and cleans better than the regular ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brake cleaner and cleans better than the regular red can of brake cleaner. Even though this is not chlorinated it does a pretty good job where I cannot tell the different. This is absolutely a must purchase when doing any brake relate repair/maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning brakes
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem where they put that oil and chips down on the road, it covered the brakes, this removed it. I almost had to replace brakes, but this did the job.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Orach

customer_reviews.title: Really... no spray nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to spray and clean brake parts while doing a brake job and received product without a spray nozzle like.... really. So had to spend hours trying to find something last minute to work to spray it. Very disappointed and it’s just little stuff like this that will run a customer away especially when they use to think so highly of 3M products. Overall disappointed bc it’s just inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteDiamond06

customer_reviews.title: powerful
customer_reviews.text: powers through buildup on my brakes. Use carefully or take off wheels prior to use to avoid damage to your rims finish.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E

customer_reviews.title: Brake Job
customer_reviews.text: Blasts off the nasty stuff. great product for the price. recommend using a wire brush along with this to really clean up your calipers
customer_reviews.author: Evan Plutchok

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Brake Clean!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product that does a decent job of removing break dust, oil and grease grime, any anything else you need removed from your car. Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: Great product, did the job I needed
customer_reviews.text: Used this on the inner edge of the caliper piston to clean the dirt and rust. Made it easy peasy for this girl.
customer_reviews.author: K. Beyer

customer_reviews.title: ZERO RESIDUE -- INCREDIBLE  CLEANING ACTION
customer_reviews.text: Incredible fluid with incredible results. A "no brainer" in the world of brake jobs and cleaning. Evaporates quickly with ZERO residue. I hardly used half a can on my 100,000 mile drum brake overhaul. "Can't touch this."
customer_reviews.author: alevans51

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to clean the brake calipers on my 2005 Honda Odyssey while replacing the Rotors and Brake Pads. It did a pretty good job and the calipers look like new! Make sure to wear protective safety glasses and chemical resistant gloves and use only in a well ventilated area.
customer_reviews.author: Folsom DIY Fan

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help remove the oil deposits on my drive and it worked very well dissolving the thicker deposits. After washing it off there was a shadow of where the deposit had been; but the drive was much improved. Now, for it's real purpose (cleaning up your brake assemblies) it works much better than most. I would certainly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jwm1941.dec

customer_reviews.title: Truely 8x more powerful
customer_reviews.text: Don't even buy anything else. This will blast the oil off of any surface without wiping. It is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, dries fast, removes brake dust, dirt and grime no problem.
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say? I used this brake cleaner while replacing my drum brakes and it worked exactly as intended. Easily allowed me to wipe off the excess brake dust, dirt, and grime caked all over the brake components. Easy to apply and dried fast.
customer_reviews.author: Lamothe Family

customer_reviews.title: Good not Great
customer_reviews.text: I feel like there wasn't enough in the can for its weight, like they hadn't filled it up with enough compressed air or something. There was still fluid in the can when it went "empty".
customer_reviews.author: Nicholai

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but then does 3m ever really disapoint?
customer_reviews.text: I use brake cleaner on every carburetor that I have to rebuild (every mechanic knows that carb cleaner will ruin the rubber and plastic parts in every carb part it touches) so brake cleaner is the cleaner of choice!! 3M has always had great products and this product is no disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hensiak

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed this stuff on my brakes, all around the calipers. It broke up some nasty black and brown stuff. And now the high pitch squeal during braking is gone. Magic.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. Southerland

customer_reviews.title: I used this to clean the rear cogs and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this to clean the rear cogs and the front chain rings on my 20-year old mountain bike that has never had it's chain cleaned. The caked on grease literally dripped off. Much more economical than the bike products out there.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Did a wonderful job in comparison with another cleaner/prep spray before enameling ...
customer_reviews.text: Did a wonderful job in comparison with another cleaner/prep spray before enameling my brake drums. Just a little bit went a long way. I highly suggest doing this outdoors and with a well fitting painter's mask. Just simple short bursts when using it as directed gave me a bit of a "buzz" and headache. After acquiring a painter's mask I was able to continue and finish my project.
customer_reviews.author: Shane M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: cleans brakes and other things you want clean....although I would't trust it for belly button lent...
customer_reviews.author: Ed Zachery

customer_reviews.title: My go to break cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy any other brake cleaner than this brand. It has a strong odor (so use in a well ventilated area). But in cleaning the brakes it's way better than other brands I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Marquezj16

customer_reviews.title: Stop buying from the auto parts stores
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the store brand. Cuts through the dust and grime and dries very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: AV Mainiac

customer_reviews.title: I recommend using this brake cleaner in a well ventilated area
customer_reviews.text: I recommend using this brake cleaner in a well ventilated area. This stuff stinks but will get the job done no problem! Do not get this stuff in your eye! Works as advertised a bit pricey but I would recommend to anybody!
customer_reviews.author: John Duggan

customer_reviews.title: fumes are pretty strong.
customer_reviews.text: Dissolves oil, gunk, brake dust etc. made my last brake job cleaning a breeze. Make sure to use in a ventilated area or outside, fumes are pretty strong.
customer_reviews.author: Dmeech

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. But you really should try to find something like this locally and spend less than half of what this costs online...
customer_reviews.author: NYC_READER_X

customer_reviews.title: Right product for the job
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner was easy to use and came with a plastic straw for better detail work. It cleaned my brake rotors prefectly and did not leave any film or residue, evaporated off in a short period of time. When using any brake cleaner be sure not to spray any on a painted surface, if you do clean immediatly with soap and water. Same goes for skin or eyes, recommend using saftey glasses.
customer_reviews.author: scarletvw

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product much better than all others
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cleaning brake parts, guns, and even oil stains in clothing and concrete. No oil residue and very little smell. Excellent pressure that blasts strong, even after the can is emply.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Sprays, cleans, evaporates.
customer_reviews.text: Sprays, cleans, evaporates. You're done. Be careful of overspray: I didn't test, but most of these quickdry sprays will dissolve or discolor clear plastics.
customer_reviews.author: Vladdy Divac

customer_reviews.title: Effective at cleaning oil, grease and brake fluid off the rotors.
customer_reviews.text: I used this spray before removing the calipers to cut down on dust. This worked perfectly. I also used it to clean the calipers and rotors before installing new brake pads. They looked shiny and new after I was done and the new pads worked smoothly and quietly. The only con is that the can didn't spray as well inverted as upright making it difficult to reach some locations I wanted to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Random Purchases

customer_reviews.title: This is the Best
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other brands, but this is far superior. I use it primarily for cleaning my reusable oil filter on my motorcycle. It provides more pressure to blow out the dirt and residue, leaving a very, very clean micro screen. The can has more volume than the other brand too, which is nice. You won't be disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: ScottyJames

customer_reviews.title: Temporarily gets rid of squeaking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product with the intention of getting rid of a loud squeaking issue I had in my drum brakes. It worked great as advertised, lots of brake dust came off. And it got rid of the squeak for a few days making me convinced that I got rid of it, but then it returned. If your looking to get rid of squeaking brakes try a brake grease instead.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Very good cleaner that worked well when I changed my Brembo brake pads to Carbotechs. Brembo pads produce a lot of brake dust so this cut through the dust like nothing. They weren't kidding about the high power part either.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the ones at the store, but cheaper (I bought it for $3.51)
customer_reviews.text: It's just brake cleaner, what can I say about it ? It works great and was super cheap ($3.51). Now I see that the price has gone up, check the prices at your local store.
customer_reviews.author: Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Cleans brakes and rims
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what else to say. It performs on the same level as brakleen. Just buy whatever is cheaper per ounce
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Effective. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Getting things shipped to your house for free (add on), AND paying less than your auto parts store makes this a great deal. Sure you can spend less on a different brand, but a big part of the effectiveness is the force it sprays with. When you are serious about brake cleaner, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: ManiacalResearcher

customer_reviews.title: 3M quality as always
customer_reviews.text: Quality product as always from 3M, spray is strong and recommend guarding your eyes from splash effect.
customer_reviews.author: N-Tense!

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: High-power as it said and it didn't smell much. Like it!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: This thing squirts far and penetrates deep
customer_reviews.text: This thing squirts so far and penetrates deep. It cleans my brakes and calipers real good. I used a lot of this in one day and got light headed but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product. I've used this for many projects over the last couple years.
customer_reviews.author: 3KIDFAM

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job. I used it on the calipers with a steel brush and everything came right off. Then after installing the rotor a quick spray and all my fingerprints and smudges were gone. Didn't smell too bad either, some fumes but nothing that made me want to step out of my tiny garage.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, used it too fast compared to expectations of bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, but didn't seem to last as long as competitors
customer_reviews.author: Nick Shades

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for anyone working on their brake system
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in order to replace the brake pads and brake rotors on my BMW E46 3-Series and it works exactly as you'd expect. With a few quick sprays and a quick wipe, your new brake rotors will have an amazing shine. It's also useful for cleaning other brake-related parts.
customer_reviews.author: The Edge

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to for my brakes. Spent 3 hours on learning how to replace brake pads and save over $200.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: A must have when changing rotors and brakes it has ...
customer_reviews.text: A must have when changing rotors and brakes it has enough pressure to get all the oil and grease off every thing before you install new pads Where safety glasses any time you use any type cleaning product for you on protection
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning cosmoline off of milsurp rifles...!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for cleaning cosmoline off of the parts of military surplus rifles that I collect. It works very quickly to break up grease and oil. Just remember to apply a thin coating of oil to any steel or iron surfaces you clean to ward off rust. A quality product that really does the job...!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Backus

customer_reviews.title: hi-powered spray
customer_reviews.text: like the title says, this brake cleaner sprays at a strong speed. unlike the ones at walmart, this actually does a good job hitting the oil, grease, etc off. it also comes with a little red straw to make the spraying stream even smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Hamdi C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works good! Make sure you have lot of ventilation when spraying this.
customer_reviews.author: Rick G

customer_reviews.title: like the product
customer_reviews.text: like the product. My bicycle brakes became very noisy, I was able to clean it very well. When on the road and don't have this in handy you can use some dirt to srub around the brake, that will clean the grease that possibly cost the noice and solve your problem for the day.
customer_reviews.author: amazon_lover

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this along with all the parts, etc I needed to replace a valve cover gasket. This cleaner worked great to clean the valve cover, and when used on a shop rag, the head.
customer_reviews.author: PEP

customer_reviews.title: High power spray and excellent cleaning use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brake cleaner - also has high-pressure force behind spray for easy application and cleaning, as indicated. I was able to use this for my whole car, full rotar and break replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Big Boss

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome and cleans your brakes really well
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome and cleans your brakes really well. Just keep in mind that this stuff comes out fast, don't blow though it on one wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Bates

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clean off brake dust on my brake caliper and boy did it work. Be sure to put cardboard under your brakes when applying this brake cleaner because it WILL make a mess. Be sure to keep your distance from it as you apply it because the fumes is STRONG.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Truong

customer_reviews.title: For my Brake Caliper Cleaning & prep to paint them
customer_reviews.text: For my Brake Caliper Cleaning & prep to paint them
customer_reviews.author: Charles Michel Gerarrd

customer_reviews.title: Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This definitely did seem a bit stronger than the other brand brake parts cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Fatty

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on 3M Break cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product. I like the 3M break cleaner becasue it is the easiest to clean up. I have no complaints for this product, and it worked well for what I had to use it for
customer_reviews.author: SigChiGuy

customer_reviews.title: Dry Cleaning my Clothes
customer_reviews.text: I used this to remove grease spots that somehow get on my clothes. Works great for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: ... last 20 years and this is hands down the best. No questions
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many many brands and types of brake cleaner over the last 20 years and this is hands down the best. No questions.
customer_reviews.author: steve d

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Does what it advertises that it will do. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking to do rotors and brakes on their own. Good product to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: JonTheCanadian

customer_reviews.title: Great for working on vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Used this to clean out the differentials when replacing my covers. Strong spray, did what I expected it to. I though I was going to faint from the fumes, but that's the sign of good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN VAN ZANDT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect cleans very well. I had no major grease issues, one can was enough for the 4 tires.
customer_reviews.author: Hussein Awala

customer_reviews.title: Works great for lots of things.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to flush my differentials out with, but I suppose it would work great to clean your brakes too ! ha.
customer_reviews.author: Dell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good stuff! Works extremely well! But be careful, this crap sprays all over!
customer_reviews.author: N.Maane

customer_reviews.title: It cleans the brake dust off the calipers well. ...
customer_reviews.text: It cleans the brake dust off the calipers well. Just give yourself some room so the back spray with the dust doesn't wind up on you.
customer_reviews.author: Weekender

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: A super strong cleaner that you don't want to spray in your eyes. Be careful. I guess I could have bought this locally but heck I love Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Traderfjp

customer_reviews.title: remove almost everything (will not remove the dirt from your ...
customer_reviews.text: remove almost everything (will not remove the dirt from your wheels), you can use it to clean your brake parts and pads as well as the motor's components.
customer_reviews.author: Ibis

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity and pressure.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans like a champ. Lasted long enough to do a front end brake change. One can, one axle, I'm very anal and want a clean slate when replacing a part.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Birello

customer_reviews.title: Insufficient Content
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, the contents in the can ran empty before completing the fourth wheel I intended to clean. Maybe i needed two cans after all but nonetheless I expected this can to be sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Light

customer_reviews.title: Macgyver
customer_reviews.text: This thing squirts so far and penetrates deep. It cleans my brakes and calipers real good. I used a lot of this in one day and got light headed but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ULISES D. CASTILLO-TAVERAS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for getting Cosmoline off a rifle
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Norinco SKS in amazing condition, but it was COVERED in Cosmoline. This stuff did a great job helping me clean it off. Just a word of caution... use in a VERY well ventilated area. The fumes are pretty strong.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: A good brake cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This product does a pretty good job of cleaning but I had hoped that it would clean my wheels of brake dust. The wheels were clean but not wondrously so.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Country Strong
customer_reviews.text: This particular break cleaner is very good. It has to be one of the strongest brake cleaners I have ever used. Be sure to use in a well ventilated area!
customer_reviews.author: Litzner

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Also used to clean up pulled bullets
customer_reviews.text: Used to remove weather stripping. Works great. Also used to clean up pulled bullets.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Burson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product...can is big enough to do MANY brake jobs!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wooten

customer_reviews.title: good price and works as intended
customer_reviews.text: this cleans brake parts off well and evaporates quickly. I would say it works better than some generic brands in auto parts stores.
customer_reviews.author: DADDEO

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaning power. The pressure is a bit too high, so it has a tendency to splash, but not a real issue.
customer_reviews.author: a reader

customer_reviews.title: Best formula around!
customer_reviews.text: This formula seems to work better than the others as it cuts through everything I throw it on. Do not use on hot parts please.
customer_reviews.author: Levy4u

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed some on my bike discs, and they don't howl any more. It couldn't be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Griffith

customer_reviews.title: great way to clean a transmission
customer_reviews.text: removes oil, grease and dirt. just make sure to use in well ventilated area as the fumes can be a bit overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Does the job on brakes, and also makes short work of oil drippings on concrete under cars. Always wear a respirator mask when using as fumes are toxic.
customer_reviews.author: bobbobwhite

customer_reviews.title: Typical 3M product
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I have ever been disappointed by a 3M product. This cleaner is no exception. It works exactly like is is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Overstreet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product -- Functions as intended -- No complaints here --
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product -- Functions as intended -- No complaints here --
customer_reviews.author: Stevie B.

customer_reviews.title: 3M 08180
customer_reviews.text: Brake cleaner, what else can you say, it works and at a good price delivered to your house.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Reinke

customer_reviews.title: Gets stuff clean
customer_reviews.text: I've started to use it to clean bolt threads. Really gets the grime out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: VaRedSoxFan

customer_reviews.title: Very Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I used it to clean away oil from my oil pan, and it worked very well. Cleaned it all the way down to the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: Brake Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty much as expected. just think aboiut buying 2 cans if you want to do all 4 wheels for brakes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wall

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Used when replacing front pads and rotors. It did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: Great Product; Decent Price
customer_reviews.text: So there are tons of brake cleaners you can buy. Some that are more expensive, others that are significantly cheaper. I wasn't sure what to purchase so I fell back to find confidence within the 3M name. They have never let me down. The product works great however if it was cheaper, I probably would have bought more. Little on the expensive side but certainly works well.
customer_reviews.author: Devin M Pollaro

customer_reviews.title: Super Clean
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, I have only used it for mountain bike related servicing but I have been very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shredder

customer_reviews.title: One of The Best Cleaners Out There
customer_reviews.text: Works great, cuts grease and oil as its supposed to. I ran a few names past a mechanic, and this was his pick.
customer_reviews.author: R. Treadway

customer_reviews.title: BRAKE CLEANER. 3m
customer_reviews.text: it works great! no strong odor. and quick to dry! I should order 2! it goes quick. bit expensive tough!
customer_reviews.author: R. De Anda

customer_reviews.title: Best brake clean!
customer_reviews.text: Best brake clean on the market. Awesome power and volume. Dries very quickly with no residue.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F.

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful, sprays out full blast. I also ...
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, sprays out full blast. I also used this to clean caliper pins. I only did the rear brakes, and have very little left. I'll think I'll have to use 2 cans for both the front and back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This is good brake cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is good brake cleaner, but I think this is pretty expensive. You could get a no name brand for half this price or less in the store, and probably a name brand for less than this also. Correct me if I'm wrong but brake parts cleaner probably isn't the type of thing that needs to be high quality or top of the line. If the rotor and pads are clean, they're clean. As opposed to let's say engine oil or something that goes in your car and you would care more about how high quality it was.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and doesn't leave any residue. The price is great and saves me from having to deal with the drive out to the auto store or walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Cleans rotors
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Easily cleans rotors during installation. Doesn't stain pavement / concrete. Enough for a couple installs.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Duran

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The can easily cleaned the brakes. Strong pressure, cheaper price than the local auto store. Can't go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Teliscope497

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well but has a strong, chemical smell and dispenses with a strong narrow stream that can splash. Use carefully with a lot of ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Dave McG

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for replacing my rotors, and when I get the rotors down, I use it to clean. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Yanhao CHENG

customer_reviews.title: It's brake cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional mechanic, and after using 5 cans of this stuff, I'll recommend it. Bottom line: it's brake cleaner; it degreases, and does a fine job without a lot of smell (like some of the non-toluene ones). That said, don't inhale it or anything; it's still toxic. It does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: morningphyre

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying this along with can of Walmart brake cleaner. I can't tell any difference in their performance. 3M is a nice brand name, but frankly it's simply a caustic cleaner easily replicated. I'd say buy what's cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Masinf

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Used it to clean a bike chain after I read a recommendation from another user. Worked quite well! Don't worry I used a quality lube afterwards. :)
customer_reviews.author: Randy

product_meta.title: 3M High Power Brake Cleaner, 08880, 14 oz Net Wt
product_meta.description: Size:1-pack| Style:88803M High Power Brake Cleaner now removes oil up to 2x – 8x faster, meaning technicians can use up to 50% - 90% less brake cleaner. It cleans brake parts and assemblies without leaving residue. Large, ergonomic actuator delivers high powered stream to remove tough deposits. Cleaner removes brake dust, solvents, greases and oils.
feature_bullets: Now removes oil up to 2X faster
Use up to 50% less brake cleaner
High-pressure, flushing action cleans braking systems with ease
Multi-purpose formula removes dust, oil, tar and grease
Versatile cleaning properties allow use on most braking components
Thorough cleaning action helps eliminate squeal and chatter
Formula dries quickly and leaves no residue

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
